item.title: 南非经济中心将快速采取措施结束水资源危机
item.description: 南非水务部长表示，南非的商业中心约翰内斯堡将采取一系列措施改善供水，防止水龙头干涸。【原文：South Africa’s commercial hub Johannesburg will take a series of steps to improve water supply and stop its taps from running dry, the country’s water minister said.】

item.title: 微策略公司最新购买 20.3 亿美元比特币
item.description: 微策略公司以约 20.3 亿美元的价格购买了约 2.72 万个比特币，这是加密对冲基金代理对数字资产的最大收购之一。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. purchased about 27,200 Bitcoin for around $2.03 billion, in one of the largest acquisitions of the digital asset by the crypto hedge-fund proxy.】

item.title: 在西非矿业紧缩之际，Resolute 公司首席执行官在马里被拘留
item.description: 金矿开采商雷索卢特矿业有限公司（Resolute Mining Ltd）的首席执行官在马里被拘留后，西非各国的监管制度发生了大调整。【原文：Gold miner Resolute Mining Ltd finds itself at the center of a broad shakeup of regulatory regimes across West Africa following the detention of the company’s chief executive in Mali, as cash-strapped governments seek to generate more revenue from their natural resources.】

item.title: 加拿大基金经理戴维斯-雷亚（Davis Rea）与 GlobeInvest 同意合并
item.description: 资金管理公司 Davis Rea Ltd. 和 GlobeInvest Capital Management Inc. 将合并成立一家总部位于多伦多的资金管理公司，管理资产达 10 亿加元（7.2 亿美元）。【原文：Money managers Davis Rea Ltd. and GlobeInvest Capital Management Inc. are merging to create a Toronto-based money manager with C$1 billion ($720 million) of assets under management.】

item.title: 官员称印度下一财年借款可能增加
item.description: 据一位政府官员称，由于债务偿还量增加，印度下一财年的债券销售量可能会激增。【原文：India’s bond sales are likely to surge in the next fiscal year on account of higher debt repayments, according to a government official.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯需要每年建造 115,000 套住宅才能满足需求
item.description: 据莱坊会计师事务所（Knight Frank LLP）称，沙特阿拉伯在未来六年内每年将需要建造 115,000 套住宅，以满足年轻人口的需求，并实现这个石油资源丰富的国家政府设定的所有权目标。【原文：Saudi Arabia will need to build 115,000 homes each year for the next six years to fulfill demand from a young population and hit ownership targets set by the oil-rich nation’s government, according to Knight Frank LLP.】

item.title: 前德意志交易所工作人员在庭审中承认内幕交易
item.description: 一名德国证券交易所前雇员承认，他利用法兰克福证券交易所从上市公司获得的非公开信息进行了长达三年半的秘密交易。【原文：A former Deutsche Boerse AG employee confessed he secretly traded for three and a half years on non-public information the Frankfurt stock exchange received from listed companies.】

item.title: 特朗普的石油开采计划将面临资金问题
item.description:
化石燃料高管们支持共和党人的竞选活动，但并不一定赞同他对生产增长的看法。【原文：

Fossil-fuel executives backed the Republican’s campaign but don’t necessarily share his views on production growth.

】

item.title: 哈里斯科技风险投资推动者从她的失落中寻找行业的一线希望
item.description: 硅谷的一些民主党风险投资家认为，也许特朗普的下届政府对技术投资者来说不会那么糟糕。但首先...【原文：Some Silicon Valley Democratic venture capitalists are thinking maybe the next Trump administration won’t be that bad for technology investors. But first...】

item.title: 特朗普回国对美国制裁政策意味着什么？
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普暗示，他希望在第二个任期内 "尽可能少地 "使用制裁，并表示他更倾向于将关税作为经济外交的工具。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump has hinted that he wants to use sanctions “as little as possible” in his second term in office, citing his preference for tariffs as a tool of economic diplomacy.】

item.title: 赌加密货币获胜如何改变大脑和长寿科学
item.description:
詹姆斯-菲克尔（James Fickel）将他在以太坊赌博上赚到的 2 亿美元投入到这些领域，成为世界上最大的投资者之一。【原文：

James Fickel has dedicated $200 million he made betting on Ether to becoming one of the world’s biggest investors in those fields.

】

item.title: 如果特朗普征收关税，中国会怎么做？
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天我们将探讨如果特朗普兑现其关税威胁，中国的选择。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at China’s options if Trump delivers on his tariff threats. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 巴西散户投资者为农业信贷下滑付出代价
item.description: 巴西农业部门的蓬勃发展引发了投资热潮，在过去三年里，70 亿美元的农业综合企业基金市场吸引了来自各行各业的投资人。【原文：A boom in Brazil’s agriculture sector sparked a rush of investments, with the $7 billion market for agribusiness funds luring people from all walks of life in the past three years.】

item.title: 巴西分析师连续第六周上调通胀预期
item.description: 在巴西央行加快紧缩周期，将利率上调半个百分点之后，巴西分析师连续第六周上调了 2024 年年底的通胀预期。【原文：Brazil analysts raised their 2024 year-end inflation forecasts for the sixth straight week after the central bank accelerated its tightening cycle with a half-point interest rate hike.】

item.title: 塔拉巴特着眼于首次公开募股，其价值可能超过送货英雄
item.description: Delivery Hero SE 的中东子公司正在寻求食品和杂货配送核心业务以外的多元化发展，该公司的一位高层表示，在此之前，该公司已经预告将出售股份，其价值可能超过母公司。【原文：Delivery Hero SE’s Middle Eastern subsidiary is looking to diversify beyond its core business of food and groceries delivery, a top executive said, after the firm teed up a share sale that could value it more than its parent company.】

item.title: 荷兰银行出售 30 亿欧元基础设施贷款
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，荷兰银行（ABN Amro Bank NV）正在出售约 30 亿欧元（32 亿美元）的基础设施贷款组合。【原文：ABN Amro Bank NV is offloading a portfolio of about €3 billion ($3.2 billion) of infrastructure loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Pick n Pay 为 2024 年非洲最大的首次公开募股设定拳击手价格范围
item.description: Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. 正寻求通过对折扣零售商 Boxer Retail Ltd. 的首次公开募股筹集 80 亿兰特（4.49 亿美元），这将是非洲今年最大的一次上市。【原文：Pick n Pay Stores Ltd. is seeking to raise 8 billion rand ($449 million) through an initial public offering in discount retailer Boxer Retail Ltd. in what is set to be Africa’s biggest listing this year.】

item.title: 加密货币购买热潮使比特币今年有望实现 100% 反弹
item.description: 交易员们押注特朗普将迎来数字资产投资的新时代，一场加密货币购买狂潮正在上演。【原文：A crypto buying spree is underway as traders bet that Trump will usher in a new era of digital asset investing.】

item.title: 电网拥堵导致德拉克斯公司推迟新建英国天然气发电厂
item.description: Drax Group Plc 将三座新燃气发电站的开工时间推迟到了明年，原因是机组并网延迟。【原文：Drax Group Plc pushed back the start of three new gas-fired power stations to next year because of delays in getting the units connected to the grid.】

item.title: 西班牙承诺提供 38 亿欧元的新洪灾援助计划
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）宣布了一项新的经济救济方案，以帮助在该国六十多年来最严重的自然灾害中造成 220 多人死亡的风暴受害者。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez announced a new economic relief package for victims of the storms that killed more than 220 people in the country’s worst natural disaster in more than six decades.】

item.title: 北欧电价因水电前景改善而下滑
item.description: 在多雨天气改善了水力发电前景之后，北欧的电力价格大幅下降。【原文：Nordic power prices have fallen substantially after rainy weather improved hydro power prospects.】

item.title: AT1 债券需求旺盛，银行可争取更多有利条款
item.description: 对额外一级债券的高需求使银行得以加入条款，从而在何时以及如何赎回高风险债务方面拥有更大的灵活性。【原文：High demand for Additional Tier 1 bonds is allowing banks to add in clauses that give them more flexibility over when and how they redeem the risky debt.】

item.title: Triton 考虑收购药物开发商 Evotec
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Triton Partners 正在考虑收购德国 Evotec SE 公司，此前这家私募股权公司已成为这家药品开发商的最大股东之一。【原文：Triton Partners is considering a takeover bid for Germany’s Evotec SE, according to people familiar with the matter, after the private equity firm emerged as one of the drug developer’s largest shareholders.】

item.title: 英国汽车保险公司 Direct Line 为扭亏为盈裁员 550 人
item.description: 英国保险公司 Direct Line Insurance Group Plc 今年早些时候拒绝了比利时竞争对手 Ageas SA 的收购企图，该公司将裁员约 550 人，作为旨在明年节省 5000 万英镑（6400 万美元）的扭亏计划的一部分。【原文：Direct Line Insurance Group Plc, the UK insurer that rejected a takeover attempt by Belgian rival Ageas SA earlier this year, is set to cut about 550 jobs as part of a turnaround plan aimed at saving £50 million ($64 million) next year.】

item.title: 欧尔班提出明年缩小匈牙利预算赤字的计划
item.description: 根据周一向议会提交的计划草案，匈牙利政府承诺明年将进一步削减预算赤字，而经济衰退和即将到来的选举将继续带来超支风险。【原文：The Hungarian government pledged to further reduce the budget deficit next year, according to the draft plan presented to parliament on Monday, with a recession and upcoming elections creating a continued risk of overshoots.】

item.title: NHK 称日本经济刺激计划将包括价格减免措施
item.description: 据日本公共广播公司（NHK）报道，日本新的经济刺激计划将包括发放现金，帮助低收入家庭应对通货膨胀，以及为备灾提供额外资金。【原文：Japan’s new economic stimulus package will feature cash handouts to help low-income households deal with inflation and extra funding for disaster preparedness, according to public broadcaster NHK.】

item.title: 大选风险消散，美股命运取决于盈利情况
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得美国总统大选后，投资者的注意力重新回到了经济增长上，企业盈利将成为美股的最大驱动力之一。【原文：Corporate earnings are set to become one of the biggest drivers of US stocks as investor focus returns to economic growth following Donald Trump’s US presidential election victory.】

item.title: 据说 Zetwerk 考虑在印度 IPO 筹资 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度供应链初创企业 Zetwerk Pvt Ltd. 正在考虑包括首次公开募股在内的筹资方案，这可能会帮助该公司筹集多达 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Zetwerk Pvt Ltd., an Indian supply chain startup, is considering fundraising options including an initial public offering that may help it raise as much as $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 地中海航运非洲全球物流公司在纳米比亚投资 4300 万美元
item.description: 地中海航运公司（MSC Mediterranean Shipping Company SA）的非洲物流部门到 2030 年将在纳米比亚投资 4000 万欧元（4300 万美元），以受益于不断增长的石油、天然气和可再生能源开发。【原文：MSC Mediterranean Shipping Company SA’s Africa logistics unit will invest as much as €40 million ($43 million) in Namibia by 2030 to benefit from growing oil, gas and renewable energy developments.】

item.title: 阿布扎比着眼于更多交易，打造人工智能驱动的全球健康公司
item.description: 阿布扎比最新成立的一家国家支持的投资公司正在研究数十项潜在的新交易，计划建立一个人工智能医疗冠军企业，并将其扩展到全球。【原文：One of Abu Dhabi’s newest state-backed investment companies is looking at dozens of potential new deals as it plans to build an artificial intelligence-powered healthcare champion that it can expand across the world.】
